sentence.Network_en: One of the most important characteristics of legal language is precision inexpression.
sentence.Network_cn: 法律语言最重要的一个特点就是用词精确.

list.abs: inexpressible sorrow , anguish , joy , etc., 难以形容的悲哀 , 痛苦 , 喜悦等.
was caught up to paradise . he heard inexpressible things , things that man is not permitted to tell .他被提到乐园里，听见隐秘的言语，是人不可说的。
什么意思... ... inexpressible nameless 不可名状的 the inexpressible 不可言说 The inexpressible emotion 情感天地.
astonish inconceivably 难以置信地惊人astonish inexpressibly 无法形容地吃惊astonish intensely 极度吃惊
